data.professional_summary: Experienced professional with strong skills and proven track record.

achievements: Spearheaded the development of Omnileadz, a CRM solution for businesses.
Integrated GrapeJS for a no-code website builder within the CRM platform.
Developed an npm package to streamline deployment processes, boosting company productivity.
Implemented media storage with AWS S3 bucket, blog page builder, and lead cycle management system.
Making a substantial impact on company operations within a short timeframe, enchaning user experience by 2 times.
Implemented coding best practices that reduced rework by 3 times and cost by 2 times.
Leveraged technologies such as NestJS, Typescript, MongoDB, AWS services, Facebook Graph API, Razorpay API, Azure DevOps and CI/CD pipelines for efficient business management and scalability.
Developed Next.js-based frontend for a real estate startup utilizing machine learning for recommendations.
Integrated PostgreSQL for efficient data management.
Implemented a machine learning-driven recommendation system and a ChatGPT-based chatbot.
Created landing page and blog section from scratch to enhance user engagement.

education.degree: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Technology

projects: Ecommerce Website (August, 2023): Personalized e-ccomerce tops and insights web application. Engineered a feature-rich e-commerce web application using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase, ensuring a seamless user experience. Implemented robust features, including authentication, secure payment processing via Stripe, and efficient cart management, enhancing the overall functionality and security of the platform.

Drag and Drop FormBuilder (January, 2024): Drag and Drop form builder to manage user submitted data. Developed a dynamic form builder using Next.js, ShadcnUI, dnd kit, Nest.js, MongoDB, and Express.js, enabling users to drag and drop components to create custom forms. Implemented user data collection functionality, allowing data submission through published forms, enhancing the user experience and data acquisition process.
